events.message: The customer reported an auto accident that occurred last night involving their vehicle hitting a tree on a wet road.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident based on the vehicle damage described by the insured.
An agent with specific expertise in auto claims was assigned to handle the case promptly.
Acknowledgment of the claim was sent to the customer, assuring them that the process will be expedited.
Requests for necessary documents including photos of vehicle damage and police report were communicated to the claimant.
The customer submitted all requested documents promptly including police report and repair estimates.
Investigation was initiated to verify the details surrounding the collision and validate the claim.
The investigation concluded confirming the incident and validating the submitted documents for the claim.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the repair costs based on the assessment of vehicle damages.
The claimant provided positive feedback regarding the speed and clarity of the settlement proposal.
The claim was formally approved after reviewing all evidence and the claimant’s agreement to the settlement.
The approved settlement payment was issued to the customer’s account to cover vehicle repair expenses.
The claim was closed successfully after ensuring all settlement steps were completed and customer was satisfied.
